problem_names:
lemma complex_number_code_post[code_post]: 
  shows "Complex a 0 = complex_of_real a"
    and "complex_of_real 0 = 0"
    and "complex_of_real 1 = 1"
    and "complex_of_real (a/b) = complex_of_real a / complex_of_real b"
    and "complex_of_real (numeral n) = numeral n"
    and "complex_of_real (-r) = - complex_of_real r"

lemma real_number_code_post[code_post]:
  shows "real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, 0, b)) = real_of_rat p"
    and "real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, q, 2)) = real_of_rat p + real_of_rat q * sqrt 2"
    and "sqrt 0 = 0"
    and "sqrt (real 0) = 0"
    and "x * (0::real) = 0"
    and "(0::real) * x = 0"
    and "(0::real) + x = x"
    and "x + (0::real) = x"
    and "(1::real) * x = x"
    and "x * (1::real) = x"
translations: lemma two_sqrt_irrat[simp]: "2 \<in> sqrt_irrat"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 2 \<in> sqrt_irrat
using sqrt_prime_irrational[OF two_is_prime_nat]

proof (prove)
using this:
  sqrt (real 2) \<notin> \<rat>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 2 \<in> sqrt_irrat
unfolding Rats_def sqrt_irrat_def image_def
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
(* Sledgehammer proof *)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
fix p :: rat

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "p * p = 2"

proof (state)
this:
  p * p = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
hence f1: "(Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  p * p = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2
by (metis Ratreal_def of_nat_numeral of_rat_numeral_eq power2_eq_square real_times_code)

proof (state)
this:
  (Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have "\<forall>r. if 0 \<le> r then sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = r else r + sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>r.
       if 0 \<le> r then sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = r else r + sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = 0
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>r.
     if 0 \<le> r then sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = r else r + sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
hence f2: "Ratreal p + sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) = 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>r.
     if 0 \<le> r then sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = r else r + sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Ratreal p + sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) = 0
using f1

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>r.
     if 0 \<le> r then sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = r else r + sqrt (r\<^sup>2) = 0
  (Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Ratreal p + sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) = 0
by (metis Ratreal_def Rats_def \<open>sqrt (real 2) \<notin> \<rat>\<close> range_eqI)

proof (state)
this:
  Ratreal p + sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have f3: "sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) \<le> 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) \<le> 0
using f1

proof (prove)
using this:
  (Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) \<le> 0
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) \<le> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have f4: "0 \<le> sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2)
using f1

proof (prove)
using this:
  (Ratreal p)\<^sup>2 = real 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2)
by force

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have f5: "(- 1 * sqrt (real 2) = real_of_rat p) = (sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p = 0)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (- 1 * sqrt (real 2) = real_of_rat p) =
    (sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p = 0)
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  (- 1 * sqrt (real 2) = real_of_rat p) =
  (sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p = 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have "\<forall>x0. - (x0::real) = - 1 * x0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x0. - x0 = - 1 * x0
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>x0. - x0 = - 1 * x0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
hence "sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x0. - x0 = - 1 * x0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0
using f5

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x0. - x0 = - 1 * x0
  (- 1 * sqrt (real 2) = real_of_rat p) =
  (sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p = 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0
by (metis (no_types) Rats_def Rats_minus_iff \<open>sqrt (real 2) \<notin> \<rat>\<close> range_eqI)

proof (state)
this:
  sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>p.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x. sqrt 2 \<noteq> real_of_rat x;
        p * p = 2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
thus False

proof (prove)
using this:
  sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using f4 f3 f2

proof (prove)
using this:
  sqrt (real 2) + real_of_rat p \<noteq> 0
  0 \<le> sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2)
  sqrt (real 2) + - 1 * sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) \<le> 0
  Ratreal p + sqrt ((Ratreal p)\<^sup>2) = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
(* Ensure that complex numbers with zero-imaginary part are rendered as reals *)

lemma complex_number_code_post[code_post]: 
  shows "Complex a 0 = complex_of_real a"
    and "complex_of_real 0 = 0"
    and "complex_of_real 1 = 1"
    and "complex_of_real (a/b) = complex_of_real a / complex_of_real b"
    and "complex_of_real (numeral n) = numeral n"
    and "complex_of_real (-r) = - complex_of_real r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Complex a 0 = complex_of_real a &&&
     complex_of_real 0 = 0 &&& complex_of_real 1 = 1) &&&
    complex_of_real (a / b) = complex_of_real a / complex_of_real b &&&
    complex_of_real (numeral n) = numeral n &&&
    complex_of_real (- r) = - complex_of_real r
using complex_eq_cancel_iff2

proof (prove)
using this:
  (Complex ?x ?y = complex_of_real ?xa) = (?x = ?xa \<and> ?y = 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Complex a 0 = complex_of_real a &&&
     complex_of_real 0 = 0 &&& complex_of_real 1 = 1) &&&
    complex_of_real (a / b) = complex_of_real a / complex_of_real b &&&
    complex_of_real (numeral n) = numeral n &&&
    complex_of_real (- r) = - complex_of_real r
by auto
(* Make real number implementation more readable *)

lemma real_number_code_post[code_post]:
  shows "real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, 0, b)) = real_of_rat p"
    and "real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, q, 2)) = real_of_rat p + real_of_rat q * sqrt 2"
    and "sqrt 0 = 0"
    and "sqrt (real 0) = 0"
    and "x * (0::real) = 0"
    and "(0::real) * x = 0"
    and "(0::real) + x = x"
    and "x + (0::real) = x"
    and "(1::real) * x = x"
    and "x * (1::real) = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, 0, b)) = real_of_rat p &&&
      real_of (Abs_mini_alg (p, q, 2)) =
      real_of_rat p + real_of_rat q * sqrt 2) &&&
     sqrt 0 = 0 &&& sqrt (real 0) = 0 &&& x * 0 = 0) &&&
    (0 * x = 0 &&& 0 + x = x) &&& x + 0 = x &&& 1 * x = x &&& x * 1 = x
by (auto simp add: eq_onp_same_args real_of.abs_eq)
(* Hide IArray in output *)
translations "x" \<leftharpoondown> "CONST IArray x"
end
